ref: 12493 śīˊpāla m. or n. ʻ the waterweed Blyxa octandra ʼ RV., adj. ʻ abounding in it ʼ AV., śīpālila -- Pāṇ.gaṇa. 2. śḗvāla -- m.n. ʻ the plant ʼ Dharmaś., śaívāla -- , śaivala<-> m.n. MBh., ˚vālaka -- m.n. Śr̥ṅgār., ˚valya -- ʻ covered with it ʼ ṢaḍvBr., śḗvala -- ʻ slimy (?) ʼ AV. [→ Brah. shēvāl ʻ green scum on water, Vallisneria octandra ʼ]
K. hil f. ʻ a water weed ʼ, śil ʻ scum on water ʼ;
S. sĩaru m. ʻ green scum on stagnant water, mould ʼ;
L. sivāl m. ʻ mould, rust ʼ,
Ku. siwālo, syã̄lo ʻ a water weed, moss ʼ;
N. sĩwāli ʻ water weeds ʼ, chimāl ʻ lichen on a tree ʼ;
Or. siuḷi ʻ species of algae, moss ʼ;
H. siwār m. ʻ green moss in stagnant water ʼ.
